text: Abatsokasi balaboola mbu; â€œNyasaye yenyanga efwe shikwhakhabeele abatsokaasi tawe, nohomba bapapa befu, ne shikhwakhakanile okhulia shiosishiosi tawe. Endio butswa nilo olwabali imbeli wabu bayingana okhula shingala bapila eshinyasio. Boola; Enywe muli nende obumanyi mukhurerere? Inywe muloondanga butswa amaparo kenyu, ne shimuboolanga halali obubeyi butswa
